Posts.Title: anyone removing IMPLANTS and having DIEP Flap surgery? Lokos Lokos

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2017 10:25AM Lokos wrote: hi,  i'm having a DUG flap surgery on 5/30. i am terrified but need these implants out. hate them! i had cancer in both breasts and had bilateral mx last may and direct to implant surgery. hardly anyone has ever heard of the DUG flap procedure so there's very little for me to research and pictures are nil. it's a bummer but i guess i'll post mine to help the future patients. good luck to all who are upcoming!
